alternative_parents.description: Inorganic compounds containing non-metal as well as metal atoms but not belonging to afore mentioned classes.
alternative_parents.name: Miscellaneous mixed metal/non-metals

alternative_parents.description: Inorganic halogenic compounds in which the heaviest metal atom is a metalloid.
alternative_parents.name: Metalloid salts

alternative_parents.description: Inorganic compounds consisting of an assembly of cations and anions.
alternative_parents.name: Inorganic salts

class.description: Inorganic compounds containing the arsenic atom.
class.name: Inorganic arsenic compounds

description: This compound belongs to the class of inorganic compounds known as trivalent inorganic arsenic compounds. These are inorganic compounds containing a trivalent arsenic atom.

direct_parent.description: Inorganic compounds containing a trivalent arsenic atom.
direct_parent.name: Trivalent inorganic arsenic compounds

kingdom.description: Compounds that do not contain a C atom. Exceptions are made for isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon trioxide, carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Inorganic compounds

subclass.description: Inorganic compounds containing a trivalent arsenic atom.
subclass.name: Trivalent inorganic arsenic compounds

superclass.description: Inorganic compounds of miscellaneous structure, which can be a mixture of chemical elements of different types.
superclass.name: Miscellaneous inorganic compounds
